input.sentences: my grandmother owned a large collection of caligraphy pens and paper .
she also had a lot of old hand painted pictures on her wall .
some were very intricate and beautiful .
i have always loved looking at the art station that she did her artwork on .
even the very drawing board she used had beautiful artwork on it .
output.sentences: The desk was filled with pens, paper, and other things that the artist had owned.
On the walls were pictures she had painted.
You wouldn't believe how intricate, and beautiful some of the pieces were.
Her work station was decorated with what looked like a child she had loved's art work.
My favorite piece was a drawing on a board which was for sure the most beautiful.
